package.name: Ninja
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Ninja Chat is a message style with the art of ninjitsu as it's theme. This theme is for those who like dark backgrounds with nice colored foregrounds.
Header Support
The header has a silhouette of a cartoon ninja in the middle with two ninja stars beside it. The incoming and outgoing icons are on the outer edges of the header. By click on the header, a bigger header appears with the start time and date showing under the ninja head. The chat icons are also doubled in size.
Backgrounds
There are two selectable backgrounds in this first release. 
Ninja Star is a background of a ninja star.
Calligraphy has the Japanese characters that symbolize "ninjitsu"as background.
Thanks
  • The author thanks the Adium-included Plastic message style as it's initial code set. 
  • The author also thanks Tiff for the motivation to create this message style.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=2734
